svg.text: Read plaintext file size (Encrypt) / Read Header (Decrypt)
Write Header (MAGIC, VER, Flags, KDF params, K, Steps, Nonce, Salt) (Encrypt)
Init BLAKE3 MAC with Master Key
keystream_bytes(chunk_size, K, Steps, Float32 Key Array)
